name: Simply Lemon Baked Chicken
author: MOLLYMARIE
summary: A whole roasting chicken sprinkled with fresh lemon and paprika, then slow baked with the lemon halves inside! This recipe is very easy and the chicken comes out moist and tastes great!
directions: Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
Rub chicken with salt inside and out
Squeeze lemon juice from lemon halves over outside of chicken, then rub paprika over all
Place squeeze lemon halves inside chicken cavity, then place chicken in a lightly greased 9x13 inch baking dish
Pour a little water over chicken to prevent drying
Bake at 300 degrees F (150 degrees C) for 3 hours, basting with water as needed
